entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: A dark wizard who is the main antagonist of the story.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, a young wizard.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Voldemort wanted to kill Harry because he was trying to protect him from Voldemort's evil intentions.
Quirrell could not touch Harry because of the protection provided by Harry's mother, who died to save her son.
